replies.body: Was it ranked, or norms? People can duo in norms with very different ELO's, plats can play with bronze if a bronze has a plat friend. I think there's measures that stop it in ranked, or at the least there's a hefty loss of LP if the plat happens to lose and not much LP gained if he wins.
Its a norm. You play with every type of player. High elo players usually have bronze-silver normal MMR because they don't play normals as much, hence they get matched with bronze and silver players.

Yes, it should because its normals and all of them are a shit elo.
Yes I know I'm Silver, so yes I'm calling myself shit.
